keyMappings:
# https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki/Tips-and-Tricks#using-the-escape-key-in-inputs
map <c-]>       passNextKey

map :           Vomnibar.activate
map ;           Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map [n          goPrevious
map ]n          goNext
map g/          enterFindMode
map <c-6>       visitPreviousTab

map <space>/    Vomnibar.activate keyword=k

map K           LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map <a-f>       LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
# map F           LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map F           LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

map <c-o>       visitPreviousTab
map <c-i>       visitPreviousTab

map t           Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map T           createTab
map <c-t>       createTab

map ,           moveTabLeft
map .           moveTabRight
map <           moveTabLeft
map >           moveTabRight
map {           moveTabLeft
map }           moveTabRight
# Move current tab to rightmost (or leftmost)
map g,          moveTabLeft count=99
map g.          moveTabRight count=99
map g[          firstTab
map g]          lastTab

map [t          previousTab
map ]t          nextTab
map <c-j>       nextTab
map <c-k>       previousTab
searchEngines:
k: https://www.kagi.com/search?q=%s Kagi
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps


# More examples.
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
